retreat_threshold.rule: HP below 50% = retreat immediately, don't gamble

corridor_fighting.rule: Retreat to corridors when facing 2+ enemies — fight 1v1

berserk_safety.rule: Don't berserk when surrounded — post-exhaustion slow = death. Only berserk with 1-2 enemies and escape route

rest_after_combat.rule: Rest after every fight before exploring further

auto_fight_threshold.rule: Tab-fight only trivial enemies (rats, bats, worms). For anything else, assess first

teleport_scrolls.rule: Always carry 2+ teleport scrolls after D:5

read_messages.rule: Read messages carefully — they tell you threat level

stairs_escape.rule: Stairs are an escape route — remember where they are

rest_check.rule: If rest() does nothing, there's probably an enemy you haven't seen

injured_fighting.rule: When 'Too injured to fight recklessly!' appears, use move(direction) toward the enemy instead of auto_fight
